metadata.title: How many views will the top Netflix release receive in 2025 Christmas week?
metadata.description:
[Netflix](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Netflix) is the most popular subscription video platform in the world. Both producing and licensing content, Netflix receives hundreds of millions of weekly active subscriptions, and top releases often receives tens of millions of views a week.

During the week of November 24-30, 2025, [Stranger Things Season 5](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stranger_Things_season_5) received 59.6 million views over a runtime of nearly 5 hours. In the previous week, [Champagne Problems](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Champagne_Problems_\(film\)) received 20.5 million views.

`{"format":"metac_reveal_and_close_in_period","info":{"post_id":40959,"question_id":40667}}`
metadata.resolution_criteria:
This question will resolve as the highest number of global views received by a Netflix English or non-English show or movie during the week of December 22-28, 2025.

The primary source for this question will be the [Netflix Top 10](https://www.netflix.com/tudum/top10).
metadata.fine_print: This question refers to any show or movie available on Netflix, not just those produced by Netflix.
